---
category: news
title: "Self-Driving Car Tech Firm Quanergy in China-Backed SPAC Deal to Go Public"
excerpt: "Quanergy Systems Inc, a supplier of self-driving car technology, said on Tuesday it will go public through a merger with Chinese blank-check company CITIC Capital Acquisition Corp. Quanergy is the latest company developing LiDAR technology - which uses laser beams to help generate a three-dimensional map of the road - to turn to a special-purpose acquisition company (SPAC) to go public."
